idea-plugin.name: VisualGC
idea-plugin.description:
Visual Garbage Collection Monitoring Tool for Hotspot JVM

This plugin displayed a Visual GC tool window in your IDE, only supports HotSpot JVM(JDK 1.5 to OpenJDK/Oracle JDK 17). Enhancemented: monitoring the detailed GC activity eg G1 stop the world full connection time.
Usage: 1. From main interface bottom;
2. From menu Tools > New VisualGC Window.

Chinese Instructions Below:

可视化 Hotspot JVM 垃圾回收监控工具

在IDEA中显示 VisualGC 工具窗口或打开新窗口, 便于一边运行代码一边观察GC情况. 仅支持HotSpot JVM(JDK 1.5 到 OpenJDK 17). 增强功能: 允许监控详细的GC活动例如 G1 Full GC 消耗时间.

用法:
1) 点击停靠窗口下方的 VisualGC;
2) 打开新的独立运行窗口使用菜单 Tools > New VisualGC Window.
